name: Attack of the Fifty Foot Irradiated Spider from Outer Space
name_original: Attack of the Fifty Foot Irradiated Spider from Outer Space
description:
Entry for Minijam 76.

Theme: Radiation

Limitation: one hand controls

Use left mouse click to move
Right click to shoot
Middle click to use your ult

gamejam link: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-76-radiation
